alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 11 at 1:05AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dixie County through 200 AM EST... At 104 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 7 miles southeast of Horseshoe Point, or 18 miles south of Cross City, moving northeast at 30 mph. Additional thunderstorms are expected to move onshore over the next 30 minutes. Waterspouts near or along the coast could occur as these storms move inland. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Shamrock, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Guaranto Springs, Eugene, Fletcher, Yellow Jacket and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
